org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class ScaleDateAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.AbstractNode

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultDateAdapterOptions

    public final class ScaleDateAdapter
extends AbstractModel<Adapters,IsDefaultDateAdapterOptions>
implements IsDefaultDateAdapterOptions
    This is abstract date adapter object element of the chart options.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
    See Also:
    DateAdapterOptions
